featured.text: Medvedev Vladimir, 43, and his son, Maxsine, 14, sailed from an unnamed eastern Russian seaport on August 18, to begin an ambitious around-the-world cruise.

definition.zh_def: 梅德韋傑夫，俄羅斯政治家，曾任俄羅斯總統和總理。
definition.en_def: Medvedev is a Russian politician who served as the President and Prime Minister of Russia.
definition.example: Dmitry Medvedev was the President of Russia from 2008 to 2012.
